DOC.brief_summary: To explore the efficacy of SPD489, as adjunctive therapy to a stable dose of atypical antipsychotic medication, on negative symptoms in adult subjects with clinically stable schizophrenia and predominant negative symptoms, as measured by the Scale for the Assessment of Negative Symptoms (SANS).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of SPD489 in Adults With Schizophrenia and Predominant Negative Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Adults aged 1855 Clinically stable Schizophrenia and predominant negative symptoms Taking a stable dose of antipsychotic medication Clinically notable positive symptoms defined by PANSS
